wikipathwaysData module¶

class wikipathwaysData.wikipathwaysData¶

Bases: object

The wikipathwaysData class actually gets information from wikipathways via number of xml files called gpml files. Each file represents a biochemical pathway composed of metabolite and gene interactions. As a result, metabolites and genes can be linked to pathways.

The wikipathways files can be downloaded here: http://www.wikipathways.org/index.php/Download_Pathways​ The reactome files can be downloaded here: http://www.wikipathways.org/index.php/Download_Pathways​

The files have already been downloaded and placed in this package. The path to the files has been hardcoded into the function calls.

This class only has two functions:

    1. getEverything
    1. writeToFiles

Due to the nature of the structure of this database (a series of xml files) it makes more sense to get all the information at one time from one function call and then, as in the other classes, write everything to sqls for the RaMP database.

getDatabaseFiles()¶

This function gets the files that make up reactome and places them into the reactome folder.

getEverything()¶

This function gets all the necessary information from the gpml files and places it into dictionaries. Unlike in other classes, only one function is required to get all the necessary information.
